document_data.name: Lingale
document_data.mainbody: '''Lingale''' was a [[spice]] found in the [[Hordelands]] in the [[Northeast Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: Lingale was used to bring out the flavor in meat, and to thicken broth.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, [[Berun]], a [[druid]] from the [[Shalhoond]], kept some lingale in an [[oilskin]] pouch.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||9}}
